channel.title: Im new here. How do I do custom things?
channel.description:
Hey!
If I go into my HybridScape Folder, I can see that I can edit the .CFG files, but how can I make it so if i teleport, i can still complete actions? Do skills? use items?
Im just a bit confused I guess...
I want to be able to start at level 1 for each skill, and be able to level up, i want the magic GFX and the sound effects to be there.
Is there any such way? Or am I asking for noobish requests?
=D Thanks!

item.title: Im new here. How do I do custom things?
item.dc:creator: @lord_ivan lord ivan
item.description:
@lord_ivan wrote:

also if you want to change coords, items you start with go into the fle player.java and your set from there look around for somethign like this

           [code]
        //giving player unique code
                      playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=14122;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=2591;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2593;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=6922;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=7114;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=6737;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=7449;[/code]

Read full topic
